entities.description: Dependence on nicotine characterized by symptoms like craving and withdrawal.
A condition in which the use of one or more substances leads to a clinically significant impairment or distress.
A specific section within the NSDUH survey focusing on particular topics.

relationships.description: Defines a specific section within the overall NSDUH survey.
Indicates that the survey section addresses issues related to nicotine dependence.
Indicates that the survey section addresses issues related to substance use disorder.
